description.p:
A video player with a focus on 3D and Virtual Reality:
Support for 3D videos in various formats
Support for 360° videos, with and without 3D
Support for 3D displays with various modes
Support for Virtual Reality environments, including SteamVR, CAVEs, powerwalls, and other multi-display / multi-GPU / multi-host systems
Rewritten based on Qt, with new support for 360° video and more powerful Virtual Reality support including autodetection of SteamVR.
